 2016-08152016-09-23ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999, in order to enable the Minister to propose risk management instruments under Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999 to manage the human health risks posed by the 44 petroleum and refinery gases.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0251 Publication Date: 2016-10-05
AttachmentsAttachment
